security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill consisting only of SKILL.md metadata. No executable code, file system access, network calls, or external command execution. The file defines AI persona behavior only.

content.user_title: Optimize Prompts Like a Master Engineer
content.value_statement: Poor prompts produce poor AI responses. This skill transforms Claude into an expert prompt engineer who collaborates with you through dialogue to design, refine, and optimize high-quality prompts using proven techniques.
actual_capabilities: Collaboratively design prompts through guided dialogue
Apply advanced techniques like CoT, ToT, and ReAct
Improve existing prompts with specific optimization suggestions
Add security safeguards to prevent prompt injection
Recommend prompt architectures based on task complexity
Deliver production-ready prompts with clear structure
limitations: Cannot access external APIs or databases
Works only with prompt text, not execution results
Does not modify system files or environment
Limited to text-based prompt optimization tasks

use_cases.title: Build Production Prompts
use_cases.description: Design robust prompts for AI applications with proper security constraints and architecture patterns.

use_cases.title: Create Better AI Instructions
use_cases.description: Transform vague ideas into precise prompts that generate higher quality content from AI assistants.

use_cases.title: Enhance AI Interactions
use_cases.description: Learn prompt techniques to get more accurate and useful responses from AI tools at work.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Optimization
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me optimize this prompt: [insert your prompt]. Tell me what works, what needs improvement, and provide an enhanced version.

prompt_templates.title: Add Security
prompt_templates.prompt: I need to create an AI character for public use. What security safeguards should I include to prevent prompt injection and jailbreak attacks?

prompt_templates.title: Choose Architecture
prompt_templates.prompt: My task is [describe task]. What prompting technique would work best? Explain why and show me how to structure the prompt.

prompt_templates.title: Expert Review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this advanced prompt [insert prompt] like a senior engineer. Identify its strengths, potential issues, and suggest architectural improvements.

output_examples.input: Help me create a prompt for an AI travel advisor that gives personalized recommendations
output: Great project! A travel advisor needs: clear role definition, user preference gathering, and structured output format.
Key architecture choice: Consider ReAct pattern since it needs to reason about preferences and could access travel data.
Security note: Since this interacts with users publicly, add instruction fencing and boundary constraints.
Would you like me to show you a complete prompt template using the XML structure with these elements?

best_practices: Provide specific context about your use case for better optimization recommendations
Share existing prompt drafts to receive targeted improvement suggestions
Ask about specific techniques like CoT or ToT when you need them
anti_patterns: Asking for prompts without describing the actual task or goal
Expecting perfect prompts without any dialogue or iteration
Ignoring security recommendations for public-facing AI roles

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Each tool may have slight interaction differences.

faq.question: What makes a good prompt?
faq.answer: Clear role definition, specific goals, structured format, boundary constraints, and relevant examples for context.

faq.question: Can this skill create prompts for any AI?
faq.answer: Yes, principles apply broadly, but specific syntax may need adjustment for different AI systems.

faq.question: Is my prompt data kept private?
faq.answer: Yes, prompts you share stay within your session and are not stored or transmitted externally.

faq.question: Why does the skill ask questions instead of giving answers?
faq.answer: Expert prompts require understanding your specific context. Dialogue ensures the final prompt truly fits your needs.

faq.question: How is this different from regular prompt engineering?
faq.answer: This skill provides expert-level guidance, architecture recommendations, and security awareness beyond basic prompt tips.
